messages.body:
Mr. Shakarat,


Your email caught my attention and I feel your Temple/Organization may be able to help me solve some of my problems. I really don't know where to start telling you about all the things I have to deal with but your list can help:


1.AIDS - Not yet, knock on wood.


2.MASTERBATION - Uh, a major problem, more often than I care to admit, but certainly no more than 4 or 5 times a day. Six tops. You have to understand that I live in a remote region of the Russian Far East and the only two women around are my very hot but unapproachable Admin Assistant and a short, stocky East German massage therapist. Not a lot to choose from there.


3.DIABETES - Not yet, knock on wood.


4.IMPOTENCY - Probably, it's been so long since I tried.


5.WITCHCRAFT ATTACK I have my suspicions about the East German massage therapist. She has a very bad temper and bad things always happen to me when she gets mad.


6.BADLUCK. - See items 2, 4 and 5.


7.MARRIAGE PROBLEMS - Not so much since I dumped my fifth wife.


8.ABILILTY TO KNOW YOUR RIGHT HUSBAND OR WIFE - Obviously a problem, see item 7.


9.LEPROSY - Jeez, I hope not. The LAST thing I need is body parts falling off.


10.BLINDNESS - eyesight is definitely getting much worse lately, see item 2.


11.BARRINESS ETC - not sure what that is but I've probably got it in spades.


I'm sure you don't usually have to deal with someone with so many problems. I would like your honest opinion on whether or not your Temple can be of help.


I anxiously await your response.


Sincerely,
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Thank you for responding so quickly.


$350 seems like a lot to pay for an old candle and some oil so I want to be sure that this is going to work. The one thing that would go a long way toward eliminating stress in my life is if I could make my Admin Assistant Ms. Bushburn more compliant in helping me with my, uh, needs, if you get my drift. She runs around this office, even in the dead of winter, in these hot little outfits knowing full well that she's driving me up the wall but she pays no attention to me other than maybe a hello in the morning. I frequently find it necessary to find a private place to, uh, relieve 'tension'. You said that the sanctification could give me the power to make her adore me and do whatever I want her to do for me - can you guarantee this? This is very, very important to me right now.

 
Lewis

You have to understand that I've been in this remote place for nearly eight months and I have needs that must be taken care of. As I am scheduled to be here for the next ten months, you people are my last hope. All I am looking for is reassurance that your methods work.

 
Lewis

I apologize for not responding sooner but I had to make a trip to Irkutsk to get a stronger prescription for my glasses, the third time this month. The lenses are so thick that I'm barely able to hold my head up when I'm wearing them. A normal person would be able to read billboards on Mars with these things.


I'm ready to proceed.
Lewis Noogie

messages.body:
I have a small problem sending you the money today. I live and work in a small remote village in the Russian Far East and the nearest Western Union is in Irkutsk, about an 8-hour drive from here. I will be able to send my Admin Assistant there with the money sometime Wednesday or Thursday. I presume this will be acceptable to you.


If we send the money to you on Thursday can we go ahead and begin the sanctification now? I really, really need this.

 
Lewis

I am very concerned about the influence of the Marine World Witchcrafty you said I'm under. Even after the sanctification I worry that whoever is using that against me might try again. Could you also send me the form you mentioned so that I can become a full member of the temple.

Thank you.
Lewis

messages.body:
Guys, I need to ask a big favor. Can you go ahead and buy the candle and the oil and get this show on the road today? You can count on receiving the $350 on Friday but I need help now. As the weather gets warmer Ms. Bushburn's outfits get skimpier and sexier and I'm going nuts here. As a result my vision continues to deteriorate. We can't wait until Friday, I'll need a seeing-eye dog by then.


I'm begging you - please start the sanctification tonight!


Yours in a world o' hurt,
Lewis

messages.body:
Well, I hope you jerkoffs (I apologize for that - I realize that it must sound a tad hypocritical coming from me) are happy, I'm blind.as a bat and can't even see to sign the Western Union form to send you the money. You could have prevented this if only you had taken your thumb out when I asked you to.Well, I suppose I can live with it since Ms. Bushburn was the last thing I saw.


I have to stop here. Olga, the East German massage therapist that works here at the hotel is going to guide me down to the hotel barber for my appointment to have my palms shaved.


Any way you guys can reverse this? What about one of those rings you mentioned?


Lewis





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
